column2: a portal used to register purchases for European consumers and pay the VAT of the destination country. If you exceed 10

column5: otherwise you invoice the private individual with VAT as if he had come to buy the goods at your premises. For more information

column1: Number needed to send to non-EU countries. It often corresponds to the country code followed by the VAT number. To request this code
column2: you need to apply to your local customs agency.

column1: Number issued by the US Food and Drugs Adminstration and used to identify any company
column3: shipping human/animal foodstuffs to the US. This number is required to ship these types of goods to the USA. For assistance on how to obtain the number

column1: If you choose "Yes", all shipments will be insured with a minimum amount of 5 € (may vary depending on the total price of the products)
